posts.caption:
‚ö†Ô∏èüôèSCARY INCIDENT: PLEASE SHARE AND LET‚ÄôS ALL BE THANKFUL THAT EVERYONE SURVIVED!‚ö†Ô∏èüôè A Delta Air Lines jet just flipped over on its roof while landing at Toronto‚Äôs Pearson Airport, but miraculously all 80 people on board survived and those hurt had relatively minor injuries. Snow blown by winds gusting to 40 mph (65 kph) swirled when the flight from Minneapolis carrying 76 passengers and four crew attempted to land at around 2:15 p.m while communications between the tower and pilot were normal on approach and it‚Äôs not clear what went so drastically wrong when the plane touched down‚Ä¶an investigation has begun.

This is the 4th major air accident in North America in just 3 weeks, but fortunately this time experts credit the miraculous survival rate to seats engineered to withstand high g-forces, along with the swift, professional response of the flight crew and emergency personnel.

Please share this crazy news with your followers and join us in thanking the flight attendants and emergency responders who helped everyone exit this plane safely! #planecrash #thankyouemergencyresponders #thankyouflightattendants #itsamiracle #karmagawa

A small plane crash off the coast of Ras Al Khaimah, UAE tr@gically ki*led two individuals: 26-year-old Pakistani pilot Frianza Parveen and 26-year-old Indian doctor Sulaymaan Al Majid.

The General Civil Aviation Authority (GCAA) confirmed the incident, and investigations are underway to determine the cause. The private tourism plane, used for leisure flights, cra_shed into the sea.

Diplomatic officials confirmed that Parveen‚Äôs body will be repatriated to Pakistan.
